S1 E10

TV-14 V, L 42min | 2020

Thursdays 10/9c

Tommy is accused of professional impropriety when her relationship with sports agent Kiley Mills (Katrina Lenk) intersects with the LAPD's arrest of a local sports phenom found possessing an illegal firearm. Also, Blake's search into the disappearance of a reporter who asked her for a favor uncovers a connection to the city medical examiner's office. (TV-14 L, V) Air Date: Apr 23, 2020
